
wood beams with influential obs

read in data

```{r}
my_url <- "wood_beams.txt"
beams <- read_table(my_url)
beams
```

strength is response

```{r}
beams %>% pivot_longer(c(sp_gravity, moisture), names_to = "xname", values_to = "xval") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = xval, y = strength)) + geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~xname, scales = "free")
```

the two x's against each other

```{r}
ggplot(beams, aes(x = sp_gravity, y = moisture)) + geom_point()
```
bottom left one might be influential

fit regression

```{r}
beams.1 <- lm(strength ~ sp_gravity + moisture, data = beams)
summary(beams.1)
```

look for influential

```{r}
beams.1 %>% augment(beams)
```
